uid.description: The unique identifier of the staff member.

first_name.description: The first name of the staff member.

last_name.description: The last name of the staff member.

display_name.description: The display name of the staff member used for public facing interfaces.

email.description: The email address of the staff member.

professional_title.description: The professional title or position of the staff member.

business_uid.description: The unique identifier of the business the staff member belongs to.

country_name.description: The country name for the staff member's mobile number.

mobile_number.description: The mobile number of the staff member without country code.

photo_url.description: The URL to the staff member's profile photo.

default_homepage.description: The default page to navigate to when the staff member logs in.

role.description: The role or permission level of the staff member.

email_signature.description: The email signature used by the staff member in communications.

business_role_display_name.description: The display name of the staff member's role within the business.

owner.description: Indicates whether the staff member is an owner of the business.

active.description: Indicates whether the staff member account is active.

blocked_at.description: The date and time when the staff member was blocked, in ISO 8601 format.

created_at.description: The date and time when the staff member was created, in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the staff member was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.
